project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would focus on agricultural credit to farmers, farmers cooperatives and small rural businesses to finance investments covering a wide range of agricultural production and other activities that would diversify the sources of rural incomes. It would also address the institutional development issues facing the National Agricultural Cooperative Federation (NACF), the main credit institution serving agriculture.

projectdocs.DocTypeDesc: Memorandum & Recommendation of the President (MOP),  Vol.1
